mapper.select: SELECT mi.id,mi.menu_name,mi.menu_url,ju.jurisdiction_id FROM bg_jurisdiction_user ju,bg_jurisdiction_info ji,bg_jurisdiction_menu jm,bg_menu_info mi WHERE ju.jurisdiction_id=ji.id and ji.id=jm.jurisdiction_id and jm.menu_id=mi.id and mi.state=1 and mi.parent_id=0 and ju.user_id=1 order by mi.sort,mi.id

SELECT mi.id,mi.menu_name,mi.menu_url,mi.parent_id,jm.jurisdiction_id FROM jurisdiction_menu jm,menu_info mi WHERE jm.menu_id=mi.id and mi.state=1 and mi.parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and jm.jurisdiction_id=#{jurisdictionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by mi.sort

select m.class_info,m.menu_url,m.id,m.menu_name,m.menu_level,m.parent_id from bg_jurisdiction_info j,bg_jurisdiction_user ju,bg_jurisdiction_menu jm,bg_menu_info m where j.id = ju.jurisdiction_id and j.id = jm.jurisdiction_id and m.id = jm.menu_id and ju.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
